name: Sengoku Nadeko (Monogatari)
description:
Lora model for Sengoku Nadeko from Monogatari series. Only tested it on weights 0.7-0.8 but it worked well there.

I'm quite happy with how nice this worked out because I included many outfits and they seems to all work quite well. The main phrase that you will use is sengoku nadeko. For a regular hairstyle do brown hair, bangs and for the hairstyle using hairband use brown hair, hairband. Model might still include bangs so you can put bangs in negative to avoid that.

For her iconic outdoor outfit use cabbie hat, jacket, jacket on shoulders, jeans, pink shirt, ribbon, belt pouch. Pouch is actually often not visible in artworks cause it's more on the back side so you can leave that part out if you don't want it.

For her casual indoor outfit use frilled skirt, pink camisole, white thighhighs, cardigan, open cardigan.

For her swimsuit just school swimsuit is enough.

And then if you want to make her medusa style replace all hairstyle and outfit words with white hair, snake hair, albino, red eyes, white dress. I noticed model still struggles with hair even remotely looking like snakes here so you might want to put more weight on that.

I know there are even more outfits and hairstyle I could have included but I think this is enough already.
